snippet: An academy in Florida has quietly produced a group of service members in extraordinarily high demand in the wake of the Afghanistan and Iraq wars: explosive ordnance disposal techs.
abstract: Eglin Air Force Base Journal; Naval School Explosive Ordnance Disposal at Eglin Air Force Base in Florida specializes in training soldiers to diffuse and dispose of battlefield explosives; program's graduates are in extremely high demand in wake of Afghanistan and Iraq wars, which exposed American soldiers to a dizzying array of new explosive dangers.
lead_paragraph: An academy in Florida has quietly produced a group of service members in extraordinarily high demand in the wake of the Afghanistan and Iraq wars: explosive ordnance disposal techs.

headline.seo: Military Trains New Generation of Munitions Experts
headline.main: Military Trains a New Generation of Munitions Experts
